name: Creative Outburst
oracle_text:
Creative Outburst deals 5 damage to any target. Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on he bottom of your library in a random order.
{u/r}{u/r}, Discard Creative Outburst: Create a Treasure token.

name: "Academic Debate"
oracle_text:
Target creature blocks this turn if able. You may have that creature gain reach until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: "Conspiracy Theorist"
oracle_text:
Whenever "Conspiracy Theorist" attacks, you may pay {1} and discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever you discard one or more nonland cards, you may exile one of them. If you do, you may cast that card this turn.

name: "We'll Do It Live!"
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• "We'll Do It Live!" deals 1 damage to any target.
• Destroy target artifact.

name: "Conspiracy Theorist"
oracle_text:
Whenever "Conspiracy Theorist" attacks, you may pay {1} and discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever you discard one or more nonland cards, you may exile one of them. If you do, you may cast that card this turn.

name: "Approach of the Dragon"
oracle_text:
"Approach of the Dragon" deals 3 damage to each opponent. Then you may exile "Approach of the Dragon" and four other cards named "Approach of the Dragon" from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for a Dragon creature card, put it into the battlefield, then shuffle.
A deck can have any number of cards named "Approach of the Dragon".

name: "Geist Commander"
oracle_text: {T}: Attacking Spirits you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Verdant Mastery
oracle_text:
You may pay {3}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Search your library for up to four basic land cards and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped under an opponent's control if the {3}{G} cost was paid. Put two of them onto the battlefield tapped under your control and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

name: Hall of Oracles
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T} Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

name: Defend the Campus
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: Professors scrambled to push the mage hunters back, leaving the heart of Strixhaven undefended.

name: "Deep Disappointment"
oracle_text: Each player loses 2 life. You draw two cards.

name: "Eyebat"
oracle_text:
Flying
When "Eyebat" dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: "Sinister Domain"
oracle_text:
You may pay {1}{B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {1}{B} cost was paid, an opponent draws a card.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.

name: "A Poet That Knows It"
oracle_text: Whenever "A Poet That Knows It" attacks, you may pay 2 life. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.

name: Clever Lumimancer
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Clever Lumimancer gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You're too dim to realize it, but you've already lost."

name: Kelpie Guide
oracle_text:
{T}: Untap another target permanent you control.
{T}: Tap target permanent. Activate only if you control eight or more lands.
flavor_text: Kelpies are drawn to paradoxes, making them ideal companions for Quandrix mages.

name: Golden Ratio
oracle_text: Draw a card for each different power among creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"When I look around, I see a world defined by patterns that still manages to defy them."
—Kianne, Quandrix dean

name: Quandrix Campus
oracle_text:
Quandrix Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students who see beauty in patterns and equations choose Quandrix, the college of numeromancy.

name: Teachings of the Archaics
oracle_text: If an opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw two cards. Draw three cards instead if an opponent has at least four more cards in hand than you.
flavor_text: Mages seek out the ancient beings known as the Archaics for their boundless knowledge of history and magic, dispensed only in cryptic metaphors.

name: Frost Trickster
oracle_text:
Flying
When Frost Trickster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: The most important skill in a Mage Tower match is keeping one's cool.

name: "Malestrom Muse"
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever "Malestrom Muse" attacks, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is "Malestrom Muse"'s power as this ability resolves.

name: Kasmina, Enigma Sage
oracle_text:
Each other planeswalker you control has the loyalty abilities of Kasmina, Enigma Sage.
+2: Scry 1.
−X: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.
−8: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card that shares a color with this planeswalker, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

name: Resculpt
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or creature. Its controller creates a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
flavor_text: Critics were struck first by the elemental's surprising grace, and then by its fists.

name: Sudden Breakthrough
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Rootha created constantly, passionately, in hopes of impressing her greatest critic: herself.

name: Culmination of Studies
oracle_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each land card exiled this way, create a Treasure token. For each blue card exiled this way, draw a card. For each red card exiled this way, Culmination of Studies deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Will's quick thinking meshed with Rowan's raw power to bring down the Blood Avatar.
